doc.description: Guidance algorithm for tracking smooth trajectories. The algorithm is based on the idea of stearing the vehicle to a vector field that smoothly converges to the desired trajectory. For more details we refer to https://wiki.paparazziuav.org/wiki/Module/guidance_vector_field .
